albus.core

Class Instances

  • java.lang.Object
    • albus.core.Instances
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<Instances>, Iterable<Instance>

    public class Instances
extends Object
implements Iterable<Instance>, Copyable<Instances>
    Class for handling an ordered set of instances.

      Constructs a dataset from attributes, with specified capacity.
